premium_limit_message: You have {count} contacts, but the free version only allows backup of the first {limit} contacts.
premium_upgrade_message: Upgrade to premium to backup all your contacts.
dark_theme_subtitle_on: Dark theme is on. Easier on eyes, saves battery.
dark_theme_subtitle_off: Light theme is on. Brighter and traditional interface.
dark_theme_hint: Dark theme helps reduce eye strain in low-light conditions.
backup_contacts_desc: Backup your contacts in different formats
export_success_message: Your contacts have been successfully exported and shared.
contacts_permission_message: You need to grant contacts permission to backup or restore your contacts.
app_description: This app allows you to backup and restore your contacts. You can backup your contacts in vCard, CSV, Excel, PDF, and JSON formats. You can also send your backups to email or cloud storage services.
onboarding_subtitle_1: The safest way to backup your contacts
onboarding_subtitle_2: Export your contacts in various formats like vCard, CSV, Excel, PDF, and JSON
vcard_desc: Universal contact format compatible with all devices
csv_desc: Simple table format - Compatible with Excel and similar programs, data arranged in columns and rows
excel_desc: Microsoft Excel format - Rich data analysis with editing and filtering capabilities
pdf_desc: Printable document format - Looks the same across all systems, suitable for digital documents
json_desc: Programmable data format - Common data structure used for web and mobile applications
include_contacts_without_number_desc: Include contacts without phone numbers in the backup
include_numbers_without_name_desc: Include phone numbers without name information in the backup
